questions.a: The way things are often make me angry
questions.b: The way things are often make me restless

questions.a: Curiosity about something new often distracts me from my goals
questions.b: Doubts about what I am doing often derails me from my goals

questions.a: Fear makes me limit myself
questions.b: Cynicism makes me limit myself

questions.a: I sometimes do what is expected out of resignation or because I am too tired to fight
questions.b: I sometimes do what is expected out of guilt or shame relative to people who matter to me

questions.a: I like games of skill like chess and clever puzzles
questions.b: I like getting lucky or finding an unfair advantage to win

questions.a: I prefer leaders with a clear internal sense of doing the right thing
questions.b: I prefer leaders who respect due process based on shared moral principles

questions.a: When things go wrong, I like to improvise an alternative solution first
questions.b: When things go wrong, I like to figure out what is wrong before proceeding

questions.a: Meeting a tough deadline is exhilarating and the best part of a challenge
questions.b: It will take as long as it takes, no point being first with the wrong answer

questions.a: Anger often gets me moving again when I am at a low point
questions.b: Boredom gets me moving again when I am at a low point

questions.a: The ends justify the means
questions.b: The ends do not justify the means

questions.a: When one project ends, I like to line up a new one and jump in quickly
questions.b: When one project ends I like to think hard before jumping into a new one

questions.a: When I see or experience injustice, I get even
questions.b: When I see or experience injustice, I get outraged

questions.a: I like understanding things through analogies and stories
questions.b: I like understanding things through first principles analysis

questions.a: When in doubt I like to pick a direction that plays to my strengths
questions.b: When in doubt, I like to follow the example of people who seem to have figured it out

questions.a: Join the right tribe, then figure out where to go
questions.b: Figure out where to go, then join a tribe going there

questions.a: I cannot stand doing futile things even if they are lucrative
questions.b: I cannot stand working with people I dislike even if the work is meaningful

questions.a: I succeed by analyzing problems and weighing decisions more carefully than most people
questions.b: I succeed by diving in hands-on and getting things done faster than most people

questions.a: I get motivated about a new project when I recognize what is exciting or worthwhile about it
questions.b: I get motivated about a new project when I recognize a good, concrete first step I can take

questions.a: If I cannot trust the process, I cannot believe in the project
questions.b: If I cannot trust the leader, I cannot believe in the project

questions.a: I dislike figuring out political equations and influencing them
questions.b: I enjoy figuring out political situations and influencing them

questions.a: When politics gets toxic, it is usually time to get rid of the toxic people to protect the project
questions.b: When politics gets toxic, it is usually time to get out of the project and look for a better one

questions.a: Loyalty to real friends is more important than being consistent with principles
questions.b: Being consistent with principles is more important than loyalty to friends

questions.a: Building a sustainable civilization is possible if we all do our share
questions.b: Sustainability is an illusion, take care of today and tomorrow will take care of itself

questions.a: The right strategy may cost you in the short term, but you will win in the long term
questions.b: Winning the game you are in is what matters, in the long term we are all dead

questions.a: The best way to do good things is to follow the example of good people
questions.b: The best way to do good things is to work on problems that make a difference

questions.a: The best way to do good things is to seek out and learn from the top masters
questions.b: The best way to do good things is to continuously challenge yourself

questions.a: To understand me, you have to understand where I am coming from
questions.b: I am pretty open. You can understand me just by hanging out with me for a bit

questions.a: A sense of justice is what makes us human
questions.b: Believing the world is, or can be fair is naive
